author: perezhilton
title: Barack & Michelle Obama Spotted Giving Zero Fucks About Trump's Baseless Wire Tapping Accusations!
text:
Despite being accused of corruption by his presidential successor, Barack Obama is all smiles!
The former president and Michelle Obama were spotted on Sunday in their first public outing since Donald Trump accused Barack of wire tapping Trump Tower during the election .
The Obamas were attending an exhibit at the National Gallery of Art in Washington D.C . where a Chicago-based artist had his work on display.
And given their breezy demeanor, it's obvious the former First Couple could not give less fucks about Drumpf's unsubstantiated allegations.
Related: Don Cheadle Accuses Trump Of Dropping The N-Word! 
We'd be laughing at these outrageous (pathetic) claims , too. 
On Saturday, FBI chief James Comey asked the U.S. Justice Department to publicly reject Trump's accusations, which implies the FBI broke the law by wire tapping a citizen's private phone without court approval.
So, until Donald somehow backs up these claims — which he won't because it's all FAKE TWEETS — we have a feeling that Barack will have plenty to smile about (except, you know, the decaying state of our country…)
[ Image via AP Images . ] 
Tags: barack obama , conspiracy corner , donald trump , michelle obama , politik
